dcterms:description: A large publicly available dataset of chest radiographs in DICOM format with free-text radiology reports. The dataset is de-identified and protected health information (PHI) is removed.
dcterms:title: MIMIC-CXR

dcterms:description: A subset of the MIMIC-CXR dataset used for validation in the context of radiology report summarization.
dcterms:title: Indiana University radiology report dataset
